Package RingPackage

Class Rings<T>

java.lang.Object
RingPackage.Rings<T>
public final class Rings<T> extends Object
This is a class defining behavior for ring operations
Author:
Vidyut Veedgav

  • Method Details

    • reduce

      public static <T> T reduce(List<T> args, T zero, BinaryOperator<T> accumulator)
      Reduces elements of a list to a sinle element by sequentially conducting an externally defined operation on the accumulation of a List
      Type Parameters:
      T - the static type T
      Parameters:
      args - the list of arguments being reduced
      zero - the zero of data type T
      accumulator - the BinaryOperator interface which specifies the behavior of the reduce function (add the elements, multiply the elements, etc.)
      Returns:
      a single value which is the result of the reduction

    • sum

      public static <T> T sum(List<T> args, Ring<T> ring)
      Reduces a list by summing its elements
      Type Parameters:
      T - the static type T
      Parameters:
      args - the list of arguments being summed
      ring - the Ring object used for the addition operation on elemnts in args
      Returns:
      a new T element representing the sum of all elements in args

    • product

      public static <T> T product(List<T> args, Ring<T> ring)
      Reduces a list by multiplying its elements
      Type Parameters:
      T - the static type T
      Parameters:
      args - the list of arguments being multiplied
      ring - the Ring object used for the multiplication operation on elemnts in args
      Returns:
      a new T element representing the product of all elements in args
